purpleculture_pinyin:
xiàn
pitfall; trap; to get stuck; to sink; to cave in; to frame (false charge); to capture (a city in battle); to fall (to the enemy); defect
ловушка; ловушка; застрять; тонуть; прогнуться; в рамку (ложное обвинение); захватить (город в бою); упасть (к врагу); дефект

purpleculture_examples:
陷入 [ xiàn rù ]: to sink into; to get caught up in; to land in (a predicament)
缺陷 [ quē xiàn ]: defect; flaw; physical defect
陷阱 [ xiàn jǐng ]: pitfall; snare; trap
陷于 [ xiàn yú ]: caught in (a bad situation); to fall into (trap etc)
陷害 [ xiàn hài ]: to entrap; to set up; to frame (up); to make false charges against

heisig_chinese_memo: Potholes at the pinnacle are so big your car could get stuck in them.  They haven't driven cars for a while so potholes aren't a problem.
Ru_trainchinese:
xiàn: (глаг) застревать; погружаться, проваливаться
xiàn: (графема) (о городе) быть захваченным или завоеванным; ложно обвинять; недостаток, дефект; ловушка, западня
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Potholes at the pinnacle are so big your car could get stuck in them.  They haven't driven cars for a while so potholes aren't a problem.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from "凵" from " deer " means that the elk fell into a trap or pit. The inscriptions from the " mortar " to the " person ", the lower part of the person is painted with a toe shape, indicating that the person has fallen into a trap. The original meaning is a trap. The oracle "凵" may be rewritten as " well " to make the meaning of trap more clear. Hang Hom Oracle as the " Kan " Bronze rewritten as " mortar " or add the " Po ", " Po " as Chi Gun hit, because " trap " the idea was framed from invasion, attack intended. "Said Wen": "Sink, high and low. One said: "Zai Ye." From 𨸏 Cong Zong, Zhan also sounds." Duan Yucai's note: "The high and the lower, the high and the lower have the potential to be extinct. The form of high and low is called sinking. Therefore, entering from above to below is also called sinking, and the extension of righteousness is also called sinking. "Yi" says: "Hang, sinking." ...Where the deep is not in it, it is sinking."

Oracle said that trapping animals is a common field hunting method. For example, "Collection" 5579 is: "It is trapped in the moose."

The inscriptions in gold mean attack and invade, and the bell: "South or (country) 𠬝zi dare to abuse my land." "𠬝子" is the name of a tribe in the south, meaning that 𠬝zi dares to invade and harass my land. Jinhou 𩵦Zhong: "Wang Jiang, Li, Nanxiang (toward), Lao (pro) order Jinhou 𩵦: From the northwest to meet (隅) Dunfa [Xun勹] city. Jinhou led Jueya brigade, kid , 戜ren first 𢽶 (trapped), fold the first hundred, instruct ten and one man.” This means that the king of Zhou got off the car, stood facing the south, and personally ordered the Jin Hou 𩵦 to attack the city from the northwest corner, Jin Hou led Ya The brigade, kid, and warrior took the lead in attacking, beheading a hundred and arresting eleven.

The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period means the fall, break, and occupation. Chronicles" Jane 6-7: "Six years, the new city was attacked. Seven years, the new city fell." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Jian. "Qin Lv Zacha" Jian 35: "The new theory of the army attacking the city, the city is sinking, there are still habitats that have not yet arrived at the battlefield, and the war is siege to be destroyed. Those who are (fake) are resistant." It means that the army has attacked recently. The merits of the city. If you are late and fail to enter the battlefield when the city falls, you should be punished with torture if you report that you died during the siege of the city and falsified (tolerance refers to the ancient punishment of shaving your sideburns).
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from "凵" from " deer " means that the elk fell into a trap or pit. The inscriptions from the " mortar " to the " person ", the lower part of the person is painted with a toe shape, indicating that the person has fallen into a trap. The original meaning is a trap.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「凵」從「鹿」，表示麋鹿掉進陷阱或坑坎裏。金文從「臼」從「人」，人的下部畫有腳趾形，表示人掉進陷阱。本義是陷阱。甲骨文「凵」或改寫為「井」，陷阱之意更為明白。甲骨文象坑坎的「凵」金文改寫為「臼」，或加從「攴」，「攴」象持棍擊打，這是因為「陷」從陷害引申為侵入、攻打之意。《說文》：「陷，高下也。一曰：『陊也。』从𨸏从臽，臽亦聲。」段玉裁注：「高下者，高與下有懸絕之勢也。高下之形曰陷。故自高入於下亦曰陷，義之引申也。《易》曰：『坎，陷也。』……凡深沒其中曰陷。」

　　甲骨文表示用陷阱捕獸，乃常見的田獵方法。如《合集》5579正：「■其陷麋于斿。」

　　金文表示攻打、侵入，㝬鐘：「南或（國）𠬝子敢臽（陷）虐我土。」「𠬝子」是南方的部族名，意謂南國𠬝子敢入侵騷擾我的國土。晉侯𩵦鐘：「王降自車，立，南鄉（向），寴（親）令晉侯𩵦：自西北遇（隅）敦伐[熏勹]城。晉侯率厥亞旅、小子、戜人先𢽶（陷）入，折首百，執訊十又一夫。」意謂周王下車，面向南方站立，親自命令晉侯𩵦從西北角攻打[熏勹]城，晉侯率領亞旅、小子、戜人一起帶頭攻入，斬首一百個，捉拿十一人。

　　戰國竹簡表示攻陷、攻破、占領，《睡虎地秦簡．編年記》簡6-7壹：「六年，攻新城。七年，新城陷。」《睡虎地秦簡．秦律雜抄》簡35：「軍新論攻城，城陷，尚有棲未到戰所，告曰戰圍以折亡，叚（假）者，耐。」意謂軍中就最近攻城的功績論賞，如有城陷時遲到沒有進入戰場，報告說在圍城作戰中死亡而弄虛作假的，應判處耐刑（耐刑指古代剃去鬢鬚的刑罰）。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「凵」從「鹿」，表示麋鹿掉進陷阱或坑坎裏。金文從「臼」從「人」，人的下部畫有腳趾形，表示人掉進陷阱。本義是陷阱。

甲骨文從「 凵 」從「 鹿 」，表示麋鹿掉進陷阱或坑坎裏。金文從「 臼 」從「 人 」，人的下部畫有腳趾形，表示人掉進陷阱。本義是陷阱。甲骨文「 凵 」或改寫為「 井 」，陷阱之意更為明白。甲骨文象坑坎的「 凵 」金文改寫為「 臼 」，或加從「 攴 」，「 攴 」象持棍擊打，這是因為「 陷 」從陷害引申為侵入、攻打之意。《說文》：「陷，高下也。一曰：『陊也。』从𨸏从臽，臽亦聲。」段玉裁注：「高下者，高與下有懸絕之勢也。高下之形曰陷。故自高入於下亦曰陷，義之引申也。《易》曰：『坎，陷也。』……凡深沒其中曰陷。」 甲骨文表示用陷阱捕獸，乃常見的田獵方法。如《合集》5579正：「■其陷麋于斿。」 金文表示攻打、侵入，㝬鐘：「南或（國）𠬝子敢臽（陷）虐我土。」「𠬝子」是南方的部族名，意謂南國𠬝子敢入侵騷擾我的國土。晉侯𩵦鐘：「王降自車，立，南鄉（向），寴（親）令晉侯𩵦：自西北遇（隅）敦伐[熏勹]城。晉侯率厥亞旅、小子、戜人先𢽶（陷）入，折首百，執訊十又一夫。」意謂周王下車，面向南方站立，親自命令晉侯𩵦從西北角攻打[熏勹]城，晉侯率領亞旅、小子、戜人一起帶頭攻入，斬首一百個，捉拿十一人。 戰國竹簡表示攻陷、攻破、占領，《睡虎地秦簡．編年記》簡6-7壹：「六年，攻新城。七年，新城陷。」《睡虎地秦簡．秦律雜抄》簡35：「軍新論攻城，城陷，尚有棲未到戰所，告曰戰圍以折亡，叚（假）者，耐。」意謂軍中就最近攻城的功績論賞，如有城陷時遲到沒有進入戰場，報告說在圍城作戰中死亡而弄虛作假的，應判處耐刑（耐刑指古代剃去鬢鬚的刑罰）。
Oracle from " 凵" from " deer" means that the elk fell into a trap or pit. The inscriptions from the " mortar" to the " person", the lower part of the person is painted with a toe shape, indicating that the person has fallen into a trap. The original meaning is a trap. The oracle " 凵" may be rewritten as " well" to make the meaning of trap more clear. Hang Hom Oracle as the " Kan" Bronze rewritten as " mortar" or add the " Po", " Po" as Chi Gun hit, because " trap" the idea was framed from invasion, attack intended. "Said Wen": "Sink, high and low. One said: "Zai Ye." From 𨸏 Cong Zong, Zhan also sounds." Duan Yucai's note: "The high and the lower, the high and the lower have the potential to be extinct. The form of high and low is called sinking. Therefore, entering from above to below is also called sinking, and the extension of righteousness is also called sinking. "Yi" says: "Hang, sinking." ...Where the deep is not in it, it is sinking." Oracle said that trapping animals is a common field hunting method. For example, "Collection" 5579 is: "It is trapped in the moose." The inscriptions in gold mean attack and invade, and the bell: "South or (country) 𠬝zi dare to abuse my land." "𠬝子" is the name of a tribe in the south, meaning that 𠬝zi dares to invade and harass my land. Jinhou 𩵦Zhong: "Wang Jiang, Li, Nanxiang (toward), Lao (pro) order Jinhou 𩵦: From the northwest to meet (隅) Dunfa [Xun勹] city. Jinhou led Jueya brigade, kid , 戜ren first 𢽶 (trapped), fold the first hundred, instruct ten and one man.” This means that the king of Zhou got off the car, stood facing the south, and personally ordered the Jin Hou 𩵦 to attack the city from the northwest corner, Jin Hou led Ya The brigade, kid, and warrior took the lead in attacking, beheading a hundred and arresting eleven. The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period means the fall, break, and occupation. Chronicles" Jane 6-7: "Six years, the new city was attacked. Seven years, the new city fell." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Jian. "Qin Lv Zacha" Jian 35: "The new theory of the army attacking the city, the city is sinking, there are still habitats that have not yet arrived at the battlefield, and the war is siege to be destroyed. Those who are (fake) are resistant." It means that the army has attacked recently. The merits of the city. If you are late and fail to enter the battlefield when the city falls, you should be punished with torture if you report that you died during the siege of the city and falsified (tolerance refers to the ancient punishment of shaving your sideburns).

陷字的基本解释

陷
xiàn
掉进，坠入，沉下：陷落。陷没（m?）。陷溺。陷于。陷入。
为捉野兽挖的坑：陷坑。陷阱。
凹进：双眼深陷。
设计害人：陷害。诬陷。陷人于罪。
攻破，占领：失陷。沦陷。
缺点：缺陷。

陷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》户韽切，去陷，匣。］
亦作“埳2”。亦作“錎1”。亦作“陥1”。
(1)陷阱，坑穴。
(2)坠入；陷入。
(3)淹没，埋没。
(4)陷害。
(5)刺入。
(6)攻破；占领。
(7)覆没；陷落。
(8)缺少；不足。
(9)过失，缺陷。
(10)嵌入。
(11)陷入某一处境或地方无法脱身。
(12)通“含”。

陷字的英文翻译

◎ 陷
defect, fall, get stuck, pitfall, sink, trap, frame, deficiency

陷字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陷； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1354第12
【唐韻】戸韽切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乎韽切，?音䐄。【說文】高下也。一曰陊也。【玉篇】墜入地也，沒也，隤也。【易·需彖】剛健而不陷。【史記·灌夫傳】戰常陷堅。　又【魯語】子服景伯戒宰人曰：陷而入於恭。【註】猶失過也。　【玉篇】亦作錎。【集韻】同埳。【篇海】亦作?。

陷字的源字形

陷字的起名意思

暂无。

trap
Basic explanation of words
trap
xiàn
Falling in, falling, sinking: sinking. Stuck (m?). Drowned. Stuck. Fall into.
Holes dug to catch wild beasts: sinkholes. trap.
Recessed: Deep sunken eyes.
Design harm: framed. Framed. Fall into sin.
Break, Occupy: Lost. Occupied.
Disadvantages: defects.
trap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Guang Yun" Hu Yun cut, go to sink, box. ]
Also known as "Han 2". Also known as "錎1". Also known as "陥1".
(1) Trap, pit.
(2) Fall into; fall into.
(3) Submerged, buried.
(4) Framing.
(5) Penetration.
(6) Break through; occupy.
(7) Annihilated; fallen.
(8) Lack; insufficient.
(9) Negligence, defect.
(10) Embedding.
(11) Falling into a certain situation or place and unable to get out.
(12) Through "including".

◎ Stuck
defect, fall, get stuck, pitfall, sink, trap, frame, deficiency
trap
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　落; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1354 Page 12
【Tang Yun】戸韽切【Jiyun】【Yunhui】【Zhengyun】Almost Yunqie,? Yin 䐄. [Said the text] It is also superior. One said Chu Ye. [Jade articles] Falling into the ground, no, no, no. 【Easy·Necessity】Strong and not sinking. [Historical Records · Guan Fu Biography] The battle is often difficult.　[Lu Yu] Zifu Jing Bojie slaughtered the people and said: Sinking into Yu Gong. [Note] It's still a mistake.　【Jade Article】It is also a chime. [Ji Yun] the same as the Kan. [Pianhai] also made?.

Source glyph
trap
Name meaning
Nothing.
陷
xiàn
陷
原作“各”。甲骨文的字形是
一个人掉进了降阱。全文在陷阱
上面加了“口”,还在陷阱底部加
了尖桩。全文铭文:“敢自虐我
上”。睡虎地秦墓竹简:“皆各中类
斧”。
ловушка
ловушка
Оригинальный «Каждый».
Шрифт Oracle в том, что человек попал в ловушку.
В полном тексте к ловушке добавляется «пасть» и пикет на дне ловушки.
Полный текст надписи: «Не бойтесь оскорблять меня».
Бамбуковые палочки из гробницы Цинь в Спящем тигре Ди: «Все топоры среднего класса».
xiàn
I
гл. А
1) проваливаться в яму; оседать, погружаться; уходить в..., под...; увязать в...; погрязать в...
陷在泥里 увязнуть в грязи
陷于恶 погрязнуть во зле
2) проваливаться; терпеть крах (разгром); нести поражение
陷于败局 оказаться перед лицом полного краха
3) попадать в ловушку; оказываться в...; обрекать себя на...
陷于孤立 обречь себя на изоляцию, оказаться в изоляции
